Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it checks for equality between the first and last elements of the array and the nth and (length-n-1)th elements of the array, which is incorrect. The correct behavior is to check for equality between the first n elements and the last n elements of the array. Generated Test cases 1-9 (9/16) should pass the buggy code, while all test cases should pass the perfect code.
